Message:
Even with Her Holiness
nowhere to be found,
there was no clamor
among the people.

The Church...
The Knights of Longinus...
Everyone just continued
carrying out the orders
given to them.
It was as if they were puppets...

Even now, I’m still executing
the order Her Holiness
gave me that day.
The order to carry out
the Witch Hunt.

Her Holiness’s orders are absolute,
and the idea of her being
wrong is absurd.
That’s what I had always thought...

Deep inside though,
I began to second guess
how “absolute” her orders were.
It was my first time feeling this way.

But...if my doubts ring true...
what should I do?

When the one I serve commits
a transgression, as a knight, I...

I don’t even need to
give it any thought.

My mind has long been
made up.
